info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 12:48AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Blackford and Jay Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1248 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pennville to 6 miles north of New Castle. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pennville around 1255 AM EDT. Portland around 105 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bryant, Westchester, Center, Trinity, Brice, Mill Grove, Como, Bellfountain, College Corner and Boundary City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
